headline: Buy 5 Mid-Cap Tech Stocks to Tap Lucrative Short-Term Upside Potential
summary: LYFT, GTLB, EPAM, ONTO and SMTC lead a group of mid-cap tech stocks highlighted for strong demand trends and notable brokerage upside potential.

headline: 2 Reasons to Like EPAM and 1 to Stay Skeptical
summary: Since May 2025, EPAM has been in a holding pattern, posting a small return of 2.5% while floating around $181.12. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 10.4% gain during that period.
